## Description {#details}

Interface for Targets to specify which operations they can successfully select and how the others should be expanded most efficiently.

This implementation has been deprecated for a long time but it still in use in a few places.

<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The operation should be implemented in terms of a wider scalar</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// base-type. For example a &lt;2 x s8&gt; add could be implemented as a &lt;2</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The (vector) operation should be implemented by splitting it into</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The (vector) operation should be implemented by widening the input</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// vector and ignoring the lanes added by doing so. For example &lt;2 x i8&gt; is</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The setAction calls record the non-size-changing legalization actions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to take on specificly-sized types. The SizeChangeStrategy defines what</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to do when the size of the type needs to be changed to reach a legally</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// sized type (i.e., one that was defined through a setAction call).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// e.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// setAction (&#123;G&#95;ADD, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;, Legal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// setLegalizeScalarToDifferentSizeStrategy(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   G&#95;ADD, 0, widenToLargerTypesAndNarrowToLargest);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will end up defining getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, 0, T&#125;) to return the following</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// actions for different scalar types T:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  LLT::scalar(1)..LLT::scalar(31): &#123;WidenScalar, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  LLT::scalar(32):                 &#123;Legal, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  LLT::scalar(33)..:               &#123;NarrowScalar, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If no SizeChangeAction gets defined, through this function,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the default is unsupportedForDifferentSizes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ac118cc8e04f71fc897c5a84874595eb0"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ac118cc8e04f71fc897c5a84874595eb0">setLegalizeScalarToDifferentSizeStrategy</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TypeIdx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a2001432f616b09f569d6147c957948c3">SizeChangeStrategy</a> S) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpcodeIdx = Opcode - FirstOp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ScalarSizeChangeStrategies&#91;OpcodeIdx&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>() &lt;= TypeIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">      ScalarSizeChangeStrategies&#91;OpcodeIdx&#93;.resize(TypeIdx + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScalarSizeChangeStrategies&#91;OpcodeIdx&#93;&#91;TypeIdx&#93; = S;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// See also setLegalizeScalarToDifferentSizeStrategy.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function allows to set the SizeChangeStrategy for vector elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ad67cd16a1da06553bb4936551f67c7d0"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ad67cd16a1da06553bb4936551f67c7d0">setLegalizeVectorElementToDifferentSizeStrategy</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TypeIdx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a2001432f616b09f569d6147c957948c3">SizeChangeStrategy</a> S) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OpcodeIdx = Opcode - FirstOp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (VectorElementSizeChangeStrategies&#91;OpcodeIdx&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>() &lt;= TypeIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A SizeChangeStrategy for the common case where legalization for a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// particular operation consists of only supporting a specific set of type</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// sizes. E.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setAction (&#123;G&#95;DIV, 0, LLT::scalar(32)&#125;, Legal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setAction (&#123;G&#95;DIV, 0, LLT::scalar(64)&#125;, Legal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setLegalizeScalarToDifferentSizeStrategy(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     G&#95;DIV, 0, unsupportedForDifferentSizes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will result in getAction(&#123;G&#95;DIV, 0, T&#125;) to return Legal for s32 and s64,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and Unsupported for all other scalar types T.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a703c0ed452aea3693d8fe1441a935d5a">SizeAndActionsVec</a></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A SizeChangeStrategy for the common case where legalization for a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// particular vector operation consists of having more elements in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// vector, to a type that is legal. Unless there is no such type and then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instead it should be legalized towards the widest vector that&#39;s still</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// legal. E.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(8, 8)&#125;, Legal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(16, 8)&#125;, Legal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(2, 32)&#125;, Legal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(4, 32)&#125;, Legal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   setLegalizeVectorElementToDifferentSizeStrategy(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     G&#95;ADD, 0, moreToWiderTypesAndLessToWidest);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will result in the following getAction results:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#42; getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(8,8)&#125;) returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       (Legal, vector(8,8)).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#42; getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(9,8)&#125;) returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       (MoreElements, vector(16,8)).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#42; getAction(&#123;G&#95;ADD, LLT::vector(8,32)&#125;) returns</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       (FewerElements, vector(4,32)).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a703c0ed452aea3693d8fe1441a935d5a">SizeAndActionsVec</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a619f20a86e6a67eb6ff2b3bd2dd8d67e"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a619f20a86e6a67eb6ff2b3bd2dd8d67e">moreToWiderTypesAndLessToWidest</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#a703c0ed452aea3693d8fe1441a935d5a">SizeAndActionsVec</a> &amp;v) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/legacylegalizeactions">LegacyLegalizeActions</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Determine what action should be taken to legalize the given generic</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction opcode, type-index and type. Requires computeTables to have</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// been called.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns a pair consisting of the kind of legalization that should be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// performed and the destination type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::pair&lt;LegacyLegalizeActions::LegacyLegalizeAction, LLT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">  getAspectAction(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instraspect">InstrAspect</a> &amp;Aspect) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The SizeAndActionsVec is a representation mapping between all natural</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// numbers and an Action. The natural number represents the bit size of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the InstrAspect. For example, for a target with native support for 32-bit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and 64-bit additions, you&#39;d express that as:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// setScalarAction(G&#95;ADD, 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           &#123;&#123;1, WidenScalar&#125;,  // bit sizes &#91; 1, 31&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;32, Legal&#125;,       // bit sizes &#91;32, 33&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;33, WidenScalar&#125;, // bit sizes &#91;33, 64&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;64, Legal&#125;,       // bit sizes &#91;64, 65&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;65, NarrowScalar&#125; // bit sizes &#91;65, +inf&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It may be that only 64-bit pointers are supported on your target:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// setPointerAction(G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD, 0, LLT:pointer(1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           &#123;&#123;1, Unsupported&#125;,  // bit sizes &#91; 1, 63&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;64, Legal&#125;,       // bit sizes &#91;64, 65&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;65, Unsupported&#125;, // bit sizes &#91;65, +inf&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           &#125;);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The sizes should be in increasing order</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> prev&#95;size = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ae619fa147f84159a8a3f54e480ab2b85">SizeAndAction</a>: v) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ae619fa147f84159a8a3f54e480ab2b85">SizeAndAction</a>.first &gt; prev&#95;size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">      prev&#95;size = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacylegalizerinfo/#ae619fa147f84159a8a3f54e480ab2b85">SizeAndAction</a>.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - for every Widen action, there should be a larger bitsize that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   can be legalized towards (e.g. Legal, Lower, Libcall or Custom</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (v&#91;i&#93;.second) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Sets actions for all bit sizes on a particular generic opcode, type</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the next action needed to get the scalar or pointer type closer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to being legal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// E.g. findLegalAction(&#123;G&#95;REM, 13&#125;) should return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (WidenScalar, 32). After that, findLegalAction(&#123;G&#95;REM, 32&#125;) will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// probably be called, which should return (Lower, 32).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is assuming the setScalarAction on G&#95;REM was something like:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// setScalarAction(G&#95;REM, 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           &#123;&#123;1, WidenScalar&#125;,  // bit sizes &#91; 1, 31&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;32, Lower&#125;,       // bit sizes &#91;32, 33&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///            &#123;33, NarrowScalar&#125; // bit sizes &#91;65, +inf&#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///           &#125;);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
